00200 inline void DataSet::addSample (const Sample& sample)
00201 {
00202     if ( sample.first.size() not_eq nFeatures_ )
00203         throw NessieException ("DataSet::addSample() : The number of features in the sample is different from the one in data set.");
00204     else
00205     {
00206         samples_.push_back(sample);
00207         size_ = samples_.size();
00208         countCategories();
00209     }       
00210 };
00211 
00212 
00213 inline const DataSet::Sample& DataSet::getSample (const unsigned int& iSample) const
00214 {
00215     return samples_.at(iSample);
00216 };
